content: Credit Card Asked by Cheryl CheongAsked on 07 Mar 2019What exactly does "retail spend" or "retail transactions" mean on credit card promotional adverts? Is it transactions (chip/swipe/tap) at the physical shop, and doesn't allow online transactions?1 answerAnswerBump1
